CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1957, pg. A7 reads: "B'nai B'rith Art Contest Winners - For the 11th consecutive year, the B'nai B'rith Womens' Council of Greater Pittsburgh sponsored an art contest in Pittsburgh public schools, in cooperation with the Pittsburgh Board of Public Education. The following winners display their winning entries for Junior Courier readers.  Upper photo, left to right: Mrs. B. Schwartz, B'nai B'rith Women's Council of Greater Pittsburgh; Caroline Richert, Westinghouse High senior division, second award, and Joyce Hahalak, Taylor Allderdice, senior division, first award...- Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. B. Schwartz from the B'nai B'rith Women's Council of Greater Pittsburgh, posed with art contest winners Caroline Richert and Joyce Hahalak in interior, possibly Board of Education building
